TopicTitle: Magnetometer? Can someone tell me where to find it?

Articles.Content:
Hope I'm posting this in the proper place, (got in trouble earlier )

In Scott Manley's videos, he shows a magnetometer being used. Which MOD did this come from?

Thanks!

TB

OOOPS sorry, dang. Wound up int he wrong place again. Would move it if I could. Sorry

Edited January 7, 2014 by TBryson2
correction
Still not posting this in the right place. This is the add-on releases and project showcases forum. You aren't releasing an add-on or showing one off.

Interstellar mod.

Not entirely correct. There is a second mod which adds these (and other science stuffs). I'll see if I can find a link to it.
But the Magnetometer Scott Manley used is the one from the Interstellar Mod. The other one is Fairly new

Not entirely correct. There is a second mod which adds these (and other science stuffs). I'll see if I can find a link to it.

Mine? It's still a bit of a work in progress, but the magnetometer and the two other parts have a full set of science reports for the space around all planets/moons, and tech tree placement.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64972-DMagic-Orbital-Science-New-Science-Parts

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64755-WIP-DMagic-Orbital-Science-New-Science-Parts

Thanks for the replies. Science pack looks very interesting!
